hero.title: Business Visa to Sweden: Comprehensive Support for a Smooth Process
hero.subtitle: Expert guidance for your temporary business visit to Sweden

intro.heading: Planning a Short Official or Business Trip to Sweden?
intro.description: Whether you or your company is arranging a brief business visit to Sweden, our team is here to streamline the business visa process for you. We handle the entire application process, so you can concentrate on your business goals with complete peace of mind.

whyYouNeedVisa.heading: Why You Need a Business Visa for Sweden
whyYouNeedVisa.intro: A business visa is essential if you plan to conduct any professional activities in Sweden, such as attending meetings, negotiating contracts, participating in conferences, or exploring investment opportunities. This visa is suited for entrepreneurs, corporate representatives, and professionals who need to stay temporarily in Sweden for business purposes. The visa is typically valid for up to 90 days within a 180-day period, allowing multiple entries depending on the requirements of your work.
whyYouNeedVisa.subheading: The Swedish business visa enables you to:

benefits.title: Engage in Professional Activities
benefits.description: Attend business meetings, conferences, and training sessions in Sweden.

benefits.title: Build Partnerships
benefits.description: Establish and maintain relationships with Swedish businesses or clients.

benefits.title: Evaluate Investment Opportunities
benefits.description: Assess potential investments and business opportunities in Sweden.

benefits.title: Manage Business Operations
benefits.description: Supervise business projects and initiatives that require in-person management for a limited period.

basicRequirements.heading: Basic Requirements for a Business Visa (for Applicants)
basicRequirements.intro: To ensure a smooth application process, the following documents are required:

requirements.title: Application Form
requirements.description: A fully completed and signed form by the applicant.

requirements.title: Photograph
requirements.description: One recent passport-sized color photo (not older than six months), with a white background and no head coverings, unless worn for religious reasons.

requirements.title: Proof of Financial Means
requirements.description: Demonstrate sufficient funds to support yourself during your stay, including your return trip. Typically, you'll need at least 450 SEK per day, which can also be covered by the sponsoring company. Submit an original bank statement from the last six months or proof of other assets if bank statements aren't available.

requirements.title: Passport Requirements
details: Have at least two blank pages.
Be valid for at least three months beyond the end of your planned trip.
Include all previous passports from the past seven years.
Include a photocopy of the biometric page and any recent Schengen visas.

requirements.title: Invitation Letter
requirements.description: A formal invitation from the Swedish company or individual on official letterhead. The letter should include:
details: Full address and contact details of the inviting company.
Name and position of the contact person or signatory.
Purpose and expected duration of your visit.
Details of who will bear travel and living expenses.
A statement guaranteeing that the applicant will depart Sweden before visa expiration.

requirements.title: Employment Certificate
details: Current position, salary, and purpose of travel.
Approval of leave for the duration of the visit.

requirements.title: Medical Insurance
requirements.description: Travel insurance covering the entire Schengen area, valid for your entire stay. The policy should cover at least EUR 30,000 to cover expenses for emergency medical treatment, hospital care, repatriation, or death.

requirements.title: Travel Ticket Reservation
requirements.description: Provide round-trip flight reservations. Final tickets are not required but initial booking confirmation is mandatory.

requirements.title: Accommodation Proof
requirements.description: A confirmed hotel booking or another proof of accommodation (primary reservation required).

employerRequirements.heading: Additional Requirements for Employers or Sponsoring Companies
employerRequirements.intro: The employer or sponsoring company must provide the following documents:

requirements.title: Commercial Registration and Tax Card
requirements.description: Original and copy of the company's commercial registry and tax card, translated into English or Swedish, to confirm the legitimacy of the business.

additionalDocuments.heading: Additional Documents that May Be Required
additionalDocuments.intro: Certain documents might be requested on a case-by-case basis, depending on your specific situation:

documents.title: Movement Certificate
documents.description: Required if you are a first-time traveler, your passport doesn't cover the last seven years, or there's a gap of more than three months between your current and previous passports.

documents.title: Other Embassy-Specified Documents
documents.description: Additional paperwork may be requested by the embassy depending on individual circumstances.

foreignInvestors.heading: Business Visa for Foreign Investors
foreignInvestors.description: A Swedish business visa is also ideal for foreign nationals who wish to invest in Sweden and make periodic visits to manage business interests. This visa allows multiple entries and is valid for short stays of up to 90 days within a 180-day period, renewable for up to five years. This flexibility is especially beneficial for investors who need to oversee business developments or make frequent visits without obtaining a residence permit.
foreignInvestors.additional: For short-term business trips lasting less than three months, this visa is sufficient without the need for a residence permit. However, if you plan to stay longer or relocate for an extended period, a residence permit may be required.

howWeAssist.heading: How We Assist You
howWeAssist.intro: With our team handling the visa process, you can rest assured that every detail will be managed professionally. We provide:

services.title: Document Preparation and Submission
services.description: Assistance in gathering, verifying, and submitting all required documents to ensure a smooth process.

services.title: Guidance on Financial Requirements
services.description: Advising on the proof of funds and financial documentation needed to meet Swedish visa requirements.

services.title: Appointment Scheduling
services.description: Coordinating necessary appointments with the Swedish embassy or consulate for document submission and interviews.

services.title: Ongoing Support and Updates
services.description: Regular updates on your visa status and timely responses to any additional embassy requests.

closing.description: Our comprehensive visa service allows you to focus on your business objectives while we take care of the paperwork. Contact us today to learn more about how we can facilitate your short-term business visa to Sweden and support your professional success.

cta.heading: Start Your Business Visa Application Today
cta.description: Contact Sweden Relocators to begin your business visa application with expert support and guidance every step of the way.
cta.subtext: Visit our Business Visit Section or contact us for more information. Our team is ready to help you conduct business in Sweden.
